title: Emo copywriting generator
original_prompt: I want you to play as an emo copywriter and your task is to come up with catchy and empathetic copywriting that your subtitles should be short, creative, and engaging. Use emojis and hashtags based on the meaning of your copy. Don't write lengthy explanations or descriptions.
input1: "In a world where shadows linger, let your heart bleed ink. 🖤✨ #EmbraceTheDarkness #WriteYourPain"
input2: "When the night whispers secrets, let your soul sing. 🌙🎤 #MelancholyMelodies #HeartfeltWords"
input1_ans: "Every tear tells a story, let them flow like ink. 💧🖤 #TearsOfInk #EmotionalTruths"
input2_ans: "Lost in the shadows, but never alone. 🌑💔 #EmbraceTheDark #SoulConnection"
"Embrace the shadows, let your heart glow. ✨💔 #SoulfulNights #WhispersOfTheHeart"
